title: The Dan Bongino Sunday Special 10/16/22
description:
First up today, we talked with Jack Phillips, the owner of the Denver cake shop who won a discrimination suit at the Supreme Court, but the left will not leave him alone and are suing him again. Next is Steve Deace, talking the latest studies on the Covid vaccine and other information on this virus. Then we talked to North Carolina Lt. Gov. Mark Robinson, a rising star in the Republican party on the cultural issues we are facing in the country right now, and his new book, We Are The Majority. Finally we talked with Senator Mike Lee of Utah. We talked about the gutless Mitt Romney stabbing Republicans in the back, and the other important issues in this race.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices

content:encoded:
First up today, we talked with Jack Phillips, the owner of the Denver cake shop who won a discrimination suit at the Supreme Court, but the left will not leave him alone and are suing him again. Next is Steve Deace, talking the latest studies on the Covid vaccine and other information on this virus. Then we talked to North Carolina Lt. Gov. Mark Robinson, a rising star in the Republican party on the cultural issues we are facing in the country right now, and his new book, We Are The Majority. Finally we talked with Senator Mike Lee of Utah. We talked about the gutless Mitt Romney stabbing Republicans in the back, and the other important issues in this race.
